summary: Diff adds a TanStack Router-based multi-page frontend with shared layout (top nav, footer, WhatsApp floating button), Internet Identity login components, an admin-guarded dashboard, and a new Motoko backend actor with candidate/enquiry/contact types plus candidate registration and document upload entrypoints. Some requested navigation/admin capabilities and branding/SEO assets cannot be fully verified due to truncation/omitted files, but at least one explicit navigation requirement (Privacy link in top nav) appears missing, and admin update functionality is not evident in the visible dashboard code.

missing_requirements.requirement: Top navigation links to all pages, including Privacy Policy.
missing_requirements.reason: Top navigation links list does not include a link to the Privacy Policy route (/privacy).

missing_requirements.requirement: Admin can update records (candidate/enquiry/message) from the admin dashboard.
missing_requirements.reason: The visible admin dashboard code shows delete mutations for candidates/enquiries/messages, but no update/edit flows or update mutations are shown in the provided (truncated but sizeable) excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer includes a promotional 'Built with caffeine.ai' link and branding.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not ask for third-party promotional attribution in the site footer.

hallucinated_features.description: Admin access control initialization via a secret URL parameter 'caffeineAdminToken' and calling _initializeAccessControlWithSecret().
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies an allowlist mechanism for admin principals with Internet Identity, but does not request a secret token via URL parameter or a secret-based initialization step.
